title: Nagi Watari - Oyobi Sono Hoka no Tanpen
description:
8 episodes about life and love of a modern generation, about people who are at a turning point in their life: a woman who breaks up with her married lover; a couple who passionately says goodbye; parents who tell their children something surprising; a neighbour who questions her relationship after eavesdropping through the thin wall of the bathroom. 
Stories full of melancholy, real pleasure, passion and subtle humor.
